A Parkour Community in Scranton, Pennsylvania

To Be and To Last

Or in its original language, ÃŠtre et Durer.

This short idea traces back to the founding members of parkour. And this is the focus of the training methodologies behind Parkour Endure.

With Parkour Endure, you will learn:

To Be. To know yourself and your capabilities, and to find your potential.

To Last. To set both short and long-term goals that will put you on a path towards mobility and movement for years to come.

Would you like to learn?

Train With Us!

Community training is the heart and soul of any parkour community!

If you live in the Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Luzerne County, or Lackawanna County areas, then Parkour Endure is the closest parkour community to you!
